### Web browser

You are welcome to use most modern browsers that have a WebKit or Gecko backend.
[Safari (Mac only)](https://www.apple.com/ca/safari/), [Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-CA/firefox/new/?redirect_source=firefox-com), [Vivaldi](https://vivaldi.com), [Brave](https://brave.com), [Edge](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge) are all recommended.
Google Chrome is not recommended because of the [well-documented privacy and tracking issues with Google](https://www.forbes.com/sites/zakdoffman/2021/03/20/stop-using-google-chrome-on-apple-iphone-12-pro-max-ipad-and-macbook-pro/).

Optional: try to install the browser also with the package manager!
Use this website to find the install instruction for the browser of your choice:
